news.title: Can a social app fix the ‘terrible devastation’ of social media?
news.summary: Twitter co-founder Biz Stone and Pinterest co-founder Evan Sharp have raised new funding for a social media app that helps users "plan with intention."

news.title: I just want to keep unfolding the Samsung Z Trifold
news.summary: Holding the Z Trifold confirmed my suspicions: it's a tablet with a phone attached. news.title: Shut the fridge door!

news.title: LG’s Wallpaper OLED TV returns to CES, and it’s wafer thin
